item.title: Ultrawide Monitor - Samsung CF971 - First impressions
item.description: As a developer, I’ve been a big fan of multiple monitors for a long time. I moved to a triple screen setup years ago, and up until recently, had no desire to try anything different. Well… I’ve finally found the replacement. The holy grail of productivity, immersion, as well as usability. Ultrawides :-) Don’t you miss the extra screen? No. The width of the screen is plenty for 2 full Visual Studio environments, or 3 text editors side by side.
